title: Password too Weak Pls help me Riot
body: 1. {{champion:32}} riot why wont the password for my pbe account reset no matter what i put is would say  password to weak{{champion:32}}

replies.body: what is the average time they would take to respond to the ticket like 5-6 days

if i get another account honor lvl 3 but its not lvl30
will it still qualify for PBE
i already sent a ticket now i just wait

Hmmmm strange. The password may just not be long enough possibly. I'd suggest using something like this if you can't come up with one that will work for you!

https://strongpasswordgenerator.com/

WEIRD....I'm reaching out to some of our PBE guys to see if there is something going wrong with that website. In the meantime, go ahead and hit up our account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can help you out 1v1 with this!
